game.name: One More Round
game.shortDescription: One More Round is a lo-fi sci-fi time-loop adventure where you play as an alcoholic engineer aboard a space station orbiting a black hole. Relive your last moments, uncover a mystery and confront hard choices in a story of redemption and sacrifice.
